name: Best WP Ajax Search
author: Amin Nazemi

sections.description:
Best wordpress ajax search plugin will help you to get rid of the core WordPress search plugin.
to active the search box you need to add the “[bestwp-ajax-search]” shortcode where your want to show the ajax search box.

KEY FEATURES
* React base lightweight plugin
* Search in posts and pages
* Live search (Ajax serach)
sections.installation: You can install Best WP Ajax Search Downloads by either using wordpress.org plugin directory, or by directly uploading plugin files to your server.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin?

It’s really easy just add this shortcode [bestwp-ajax-search] to a page of your website and make sure the best wp ajax search plugin is active.

Where can I ask my questions regarding this plugin?

  • You can ask your questions here in English at live chat.

short_description: A lightweight react based ajax live search plugin, use [bestwp-ajax-search] shortcode to show the search box anywhere you want.
